thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 3 of 185
thread.title: Lance Wade

author: Lance Wade
title: Lance Wade
text: Actually to date I would offer a five star rating; however, with only a handful of transactions I will stick with the four stars for now. The major attraction for me has been the straight forward costing and purchasing on the site. I have had a huge amount of trouble with others sites and hidden wording, costs and unwanted sign ups for monthly billings. The selection has been diverse and the product is easy to review and or place as a temp in a client facing rough.
